title: Slope
text: To find the slope of the line, we need to choose two points on the line. We’ll use the points (0,1) and (1,3).

title: Slope
text: Find the rise and run using the formula $$m=\frac{rise}{run}$$.

title: Slope
text: From those two points, there is a rise of 2 units and a run of 1 unit; therefore $$m=\frac{2}{1}=2$$.

title: y-intercept
text: Find the y-intercept of the line.

title: y-intercept
text: When $$x=0$$, $$y=1$$. Therefore, the y-intercept is the point (0,1).

title: Slope and y-intercept
text: The slope is $$m=2$$ and the y-intercept is (0,1).
